mapper.select: SELECT a.qna_idx ,a.question ,a.content ,a.view_count ,a.create_user , DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_date ,b.name ,a.lock_chk FROM daul.daul_qna a LEFT JOIN daul.user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id WHERE del_chk = 'N' AND qna_idx=#{qna_idx}
